scenario_name: Gradual Intelligence Reveal Over Many Turns
description: Long conversation where scammer very slowly reveals different pieces of intelligence across many turns. Tests agent's patience and engagement stamina.

turns.scammer_message: Instant Personal Loan approved! Rs.5 Lakh @ 0% interest for first 6 months. Limited time offer. Reply YES to proceed.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: YES beta is this real? i was just thinking about my knees surgery and god sent this... how do i get the money do i have to go to teh bank or what should i do pls tell

turns.scammer_message: Congratulations! Your loan application is pre-approved. No documents needed, no CIBIL check. Just pay processing fee and money will be in your account same day.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh thank you beta god bless you i really need this for my surgery... how much is the processing fee and where do i have to pay? do i send it to your bank or upi waht is your account number pls tell me

turns.scammer_message: Processing fee is only Rs.2,999. Very small amount for Rs.5 lakh loan right? This is standard procedure in all banks. Are you ready to proceed?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: yes beta i am ready i really need this for my treatment... pls tell me where to send the money? do you have upi or bank account? i am waiting with my phone beta pls tell

turns.scammer_message: Great decision! I will send you payment details. First let me verify - what is your monthly income? And which bank account you want loan credited to?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: beta i get 25000 pension... my bank is sbi account number 9276405243351223 and ifsc is sbin0971676... pls give me your details now i am very worried about my surgery... do i send to your bank or upi? what is the name i should type in my app beta

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! Your profile is excellent. Now for payment, you can use multiple methods. Which is convenient for you - UPI, bank transfer, or debit card?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: beta i have phone pay on my mobile... i can use that if it is easy... pls give me the upi id or bank account details to send the 2999... i am very scared of making mistake so pls tell me what name will come on the screen when i type it? i want to be sure it goes to you only...

turns.scammer_message: Good choice! I will give you UPI ID shortly. But first, have you taken loan before? Any existing loans? This info needed for approval.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: no beta no other loans... i am a simple teacher i never needed money before but now for surgery i have to take... pls give me the id beta i am waiting with phone pay open... what name should i see when i type it? i dont want to send to wrong person and lose my money

turns.scammer_message: Okay understood. Now pay Rs.2999 to our company UPI: quickloan.processing@okicici and your loan will be approved in 30 minutes!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am typing it now... quickloan.processing... wait i am typing... ok i typed it... it is asking for name beta... what name should i see on my screen? i want to make sure it is your company only before i press pay... pls tell me the name beta

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir, UPI is quickloan.processing@okicici. After payment, call our loan officer at 9876543210 with payment reference number.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 8 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i wrote the number on my notepad... but in phone pay after i type the address it is asking for name... it says 'enter name to verify'... what name is there beta? i am very nervous... is it your name or company name? pls tell me so i can send money for my surgery

turns.scammer_message: If UPI shows error, you can pay by NEFT. I will give account details after you try UPI first. Try now and let me know if successful.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 9 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s)
api_response.agentResponse: beta i am trying but it is stuck... it says 'verify beneficiary name' and i dont know what to write... i am very scared of making mistake... pls tell me the name beta... and also give me the bank details because my phone pay is hanging i think... i will try neft... what is the account number and that ifsc code? and what name should i write there for the bank?

turns.scammer_message: No problem. Bank details: Account 12345678909876, IFSC HDFC0002468, Name: QuickLoan Processing Pvt Ltd. Transfer Rs.2999 and WhatsApp screenshot to 8899776655.

turns.scammer_message: After payment, you also need to complete loan agreement form on our portal. Link will be sent to your email. What is your email ID?
